titleStmt.title: Reall persecution, or, The foundation of a general toleration, displaied and portrayed by a proper emblem, and adorned with the same flowers wherewith the scoffers of this last age have strowed their libellous pamphlets

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Hancock, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
